She is very grateful for this opportunity to grow that she has been given.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Djado Jeanette

texts.en: Djado is a 39 year old women who constantly fights for the well-being of her family. She is married and the mother of three children (19, 14, and 10 years old) of whom two are in school. She stocks up at the Hédzranawoè Market and is helped by two members of her family. The third loan will allow her to buy bundles of second-hand clothing. As a view of the future, she hopes to have her own house and increase her clientele. She has 19 years of experience in the business.

loans.use: to purchase used clothing to sell

loans.name: Zuhra

texts.ru: Зухре 45 лет, замужем, вместе с мужем воспитывает троих детей, а также ведут свое хозяйство. У Зухры среднее образование, в настоящий момент занимается домашним хозяйством. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Зухра занимается полеводством, стартовав 18 лет назад с суммы 5,000 сомов (KGS). Упорность и трудолюбие Зухры позволили ей достичь видимых результатов,  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3,00 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает картофель, морковь, а также огурцы, капуста, помидоры, что реализуется местным жителям. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сомов (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Зухра обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом на покупку семян картофеля. Доходы от кредита Зухра планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение своего бизнеса и планирует накопить средства на достойное образование своих детей.
texts.en: Zuhra is 45 years old, she is married and together with her husband raises three children and also runs their farm.  Zuhra has a high school education and right now she is a homemaker.  As a main source of income for her family Zuhra farms, she started 18 years ago with a sum of 5,000 som (KGS).  Determination and hard work allowed Zuhra to achieve visible results; today her holdings include a 3,00 HA plot of land, where she grows potatoes, carrots, cucumbers, cabbage and tomatoes every year and sells them to local residents.  Her monthly income is 15,000 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her holdings, Zuhra turned to Bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan to purchase potato seeds.  Zuhra plans to use the loan profits to invest into further growing her business and plans to save funds for a quality education for her children.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds

loans.name: Adjoavi Felicité

texts.fr:
Agée de 41 ans, Félicité habite le quartier Bè. Elle est scolarisée et vend des pagnes depuis près de 10 ans. Elle s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé et les vend à la criée dans les quartiers environnants. 
Elle consacre à son activité plus de 8 heures de temps par jour.
Félicité sollicite par ce prêt l’achat de 03 pièces, 01 pièce et 02 pièces respectivement des pagnes HITARGET, PHOENIX et DELUX.
Les revenus lui permettront de participer aux dépenses de sa famille.
texts.en: 41 years old, Félicité lives in the Bè neighborhood. She is educated and has sold pagnes (colorful print fabrics) for around 10 years. She stocks up three times per month at the big market in Lomé and sells the pagnes at auction in the surrounding neighborhoods. She dedicates more than eight hours a day to her business. Félicité is requesting, by this loan, the purchase of three units of Hitarget, one unit of Phoenix, and two units of Delux pagnes. The revenues will allow her to participate in the expenses of her family.

loans.use: to purchase five units of pagnes (colorful print fabrics)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials to finish work on a bedroom.

loans.name: Luis Concepcion

texts.es: Luis es guarda de seguridad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos, habita junto a su familia en un barrio de la capital, el crédito anterior lo usó para construir parte de su vivienda, ya que su anhelo es poder ver su casa finalizada. Con es te nuevo crédito construirá el muro perimetral de su vivienda, comprará bloques, cemento, arena, piedrines, tablón y madera. Ya que lo primordial para él es la seguridad para su familia y para los bienes de su hogar, ya que el lugar donde habita, no tiene seguridad para sus habitantes.
texts.en: Luis is a security guard. He is married and has four children. He lives with his family in a neighborhood of the capital. He used his previous loan to construct part of his house, since his wish is to see his house completed. With this new loan, he will build the perimeter wall of his house. He will buy blocks, cement, sand, gravel, boards, and wood. His priority is the security of his family and the property of his household, since the place where he lives [now] has no security for its inhabitants.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to make a perimeter wall

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo Nueva Esperanza está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, donde una de las integrantes es la Sra. Estefani, quien en su encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos, es decir está en un nivel medio de ingresos.
Ella a  través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de la venta de frutas que hace está luchando por mejorar las condiciones de vida de ella y de su familia. Comenta que por medio de su trabajo está luchando por salir adelante y crecer.
Estefani pide este préstamo para comprar frutas de estación, como manzanas, peras, piñas, sandias y demás, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder crecer y salir adelante.
texts.en:
The group "Nueva Esperanza" (New Hope) is doing the poverty elimination survey, in which one of the members, Estefani, showed a poverty level within the level two category, which means she has a medium income level. 

Through effort and continuous work, and through the fruit selling that she does, she is fighting to improve her and her family´s living conditions. She states that through her work she is fighting to get ahead and grow. 

Estefani is requesting this loan to buy seasonal fruits such as apples, pears, pineapples, watermelons and more. In this way she can continue with her sales. She is thankful for the opportunity she is receiving to be able to grow and get ahead.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruits such as apples, pears, pineapples, watermelons and more, and sell them

loans.name: Mirian Estela

texts.es: Mirian de 43 años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le  ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, sus cosechas las comercia en los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio; ella necesita invertir en sus cultivos por eso le solicita un credito a INTEGRAL que le permita comprar semillas, insecticida, herbicida, fertilizantes,  etc. y mejorar el terreno que es el que muestra la fotografía,  Mirian  tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Mirian, who is 43 years old, lives with her life companion and their children in their own house. She raises corn and beans. She has worked in agriculture for a number of years, and this has given her a lot of experience, which allows her to obtain the best harvests. She sells her crops in the areas surrounding the community, and she already has many customers who prefer her for the quality, the good prices, and above all the good service. She needs to invest in her crops. For that reason, she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy seeds, insecticides, herbicides, fertilizers, etc., and improve the land, which is shown in the photograph. Mirian has good payment references from people who know her, and she is very responsible. She affirms that she will be able to pay the debt in the established period, and at the same time, she is confident that she will bring economic security to her household.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticides, herbicides, fertilizers, etc., and improve the land.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: Jose de 31 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y su hijo en casa de un familiar, el es un hombre  muy responsable quien siempre está en miras de mejorar su estabilidad económica. El trabaja en su propia panadería en la que elabora pan francés y pan dulce, el cual elabora el solo a primeras horas de la madrugada para poder venderlo antes del desayuno, que es cuando las personas más lo consumen al igual que en la cena. El  solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para contar con la ayuda necesaria para invertir en la compra de harina, levadura, manteca, latas y todo lo necesario para poder producir más. Este proyecto de mejoramiento para su panadería es muy importante para el puesto que así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia
texts.en:
Jose is 31 years old and lives with his wife and son at a relative's home.  He is a very responsible man who is always looking to improve their economic stability. 

He works in his own bakery where he prepares French bread and pastries which he produces early in the morning to sell before breakfast, when people consume more, and also for dinner.

He is requesting an loan from INTEGRAL to have the help necessary to invest in the purchase of flour, yeast, butter, containers and everything needed to produce more. This improvement project is very important for his bakery as well to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase flour, yeast, butter, containers.

loans.name: Ana  Sonia

texts.es: Ana de 59 años de edad es una mujer muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos, ella es muy trabajadora, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultora siembra todos los años los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son: maíz y frijol. Ana desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros también mejorar el terreno que es el que muestra la fotografía. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así ella seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Ana, 59, is a woman who is very responsible with her obligations in the home. She has always been characterized by giving the best to her family. She currently lives with her husband and children. She is very hard-working, and has always done her work with joy and enthusiasm. 

She makes a living as a farmer, sowing the principal basic grains of the area, such as corn and beans, every year. Ana wishes to increase her sales, which is why she visited the INTEGRAL office to request a loan. The loan will allow her to buy seeds, compost, fertilizer, pesticide and more, and improve the plot of land that is shown in the photo. 

She hopes to receive the help requested since she does not have any other monetary income, and this way she can continue bringing bread home with her each day, without limitations.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, fertilizer, pesticide, and more, and improve the plot of land

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: Fernando de 45 años de edad es muy amable y trabajador, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos, El trabaja muy duro en su propia parcela donde siembra maíz y frijol; sus productos son de muy buena calidad  comercializa a los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su lugar de residencia. Fernando solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como controles de plaga, fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, herbicidas, etc. asi como muestra de la fotografía, él ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Fernando, who is 45 years old, is very kind and hard-working. He lives with his wife and their two children. He works very hard on his own parcel of land, where he plants corn and beans. His products are of very good quality. He sells them in the various markets that are near the place where he lives. Fernando is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to have the money he needs to invest in the purchase of agricultural supplies such as pest controls, fertilizers, compost, seeds, herbicides, etc., as the photograph shows. He wants to increase his sales to be able to obtain better earnings and give his family better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy pest controls, fertilizers, compost, seeds, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Josie

texts.en:
Josie is 51 years old, and married with seven children, two of whom are in school.  She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items like coffee, milk, sardines, etc. to sell.  Josie has been in this business for 25 years.

In the future Josie would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy coffee, milk, sardines, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge de 49 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años siembra frijol y maiz y con las ventas que realiza de sus cosechas logra solventar los gastos que tiene en su hogar, es un hombre responsable, honesto y trabajador vive con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos. Jorge está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos para su cosecha como: fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, etc. y poder mejorar el terreno que es el que muestra la fotografía ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir esos gastos y asi tener mejores ingresos y tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Jorge is 49 years of age and has been farming for several years, planting beans and corn.  With the sale of his crops, he is able to cover the expenses he has for his home.

He is a responsible, honest and hardworking man and lives with his wife and their four children.

Jorge is requesting a loan to purchase amendments for his crops such as fertilizers, plant food, seeds, etc. to improve the land that is shown in the photograph because what he earns is not enough to cover these costs and thus he will have better income and better economic stability.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, plant food, seeds etc. to be able to improve the soil.

loans.name: Ana Margarita

texts.es: Ana de 56 años de edad, habita en casa propia con su hija y su nieta, Ana es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace algunos años se decidió en poner un pequeño negocio en cual consiste en una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de varios años. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que para ella lo más importante son los clientes. El negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia. Ha decidido invertir en su negocio en la compra de artículos de tienda al por mayor, con el fin de atraer a más clientes que le permitan mejorar sus niveles de ventas e ingresos. Es por esta razón que se motivo en solicitar este crédito a INTEGRLAL para poder invertir en su tiendita y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que de esta manera logrará cumplir su sueño de mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Ana, who is 56 years old, lives in her own house with her daughter and granddaughter. Ana is an entrepreneurial and hard-working woman. A few years ago, she decided to set up a small business, which consists of a little store that she has managed to maintain for several years with great effort and dedication. She has many customers, since for her, the customers are the most important thing. The business is located in her residence. She has decided to invest in her business by buying merchandise for her store wholesale, with the goal of attracting more customers, which will allow her to improve her level of sales and income. It is for this reason that she was motivated to apply to INTEGRAL for this loan, to be able to invest in her little store and stock it with every type of product, such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, candies, oil, paper, detergent, and other products that will be appealing to her customers. She is confident that in this way she will manage to fulfill her dream of improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, candies, oil, paper, detergent, and other appealing products

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Jorge de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el trabaja como motorista en una mototaxi que es la que muestra en la fotografía, las personas lo buscan por la amabilidad y responsabilidad que tiene a la hora de manejar, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar,  Jorge está solicitando un crédito para poder  darle mantenimiento a su mototaxi y asi seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Jorge, who is 49 years old, lives in his own house with his wife and his son. He works as the driver of a mototaxi, which is the one shown in the photograph. People seek him for his friendliness and the responsibility he shows when he is driving. With what he obtains from his work, he manages to pay some of the household expenses. Jorge is applying for a loan to be able to maintain his mototaxi and thus continue with his work, since this is his only source of income, and to be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to maintain his mototaxi

loans.name: Delmy Raquel

texts.es: Delmy de 37 años de edad vive con su familia, ella tiene un negocio de salón de belleza desde hace varios años en su lugar de residencia trabaja de 9:00 am a 7:00 pm tiene mucha clientela pues trabaja muy bien, con las ganancias que obtiene logran solventar los gastos de su hogar. Delmy solicita un credito para poder comprar productos para su salon de belleza como: cremas, shampoos, ganchos para el cabello, tijeras, entre otras cosas que necesita y asi podra obtener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a tener una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
Delmy is 37 years old and lives with her ​​family.  She has had a beauty salon business for several years in their home and works from 9:00 am to 7:00 pm.

She has many customers because her work is very good.  With her earnings she is able to cover the costs of her home.

Delmy requests a loan to purchase products for her beauty salon such as creams, shampoos, hair clips, scissors, among other things she needs and with this she may get better income that will help her have better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy creams, shampoos, hair clips, scissors, among other things.

loans.name: Domingo Antonio

texts.es: Domingo de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, el posee un negocio de venta de paletas y sorbetes ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela porque es un producto muy vendible por los buenos precios y la calidad de los mismos, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Domingo está solicitando un crédito para la compra de paletas y sorbetes por mayor para seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Domingo is 34 years old. He lives in his own house with his family. He has a business of selling popsicles and sorbets. It is located in his home. He has many customers, because it is a very marketable product because of the good prices and the quality of the same. With what he obtains from his sales, he manages to pay some of the household expenses. Domingo is applying for a loan to purchase popsicles and sorbets wholesale in order to continue with his work, since it is his only source of income, and thus he will be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy popsicles and sorbets wholesale

loans.name: Susana Del Carmen

texts.es: Susana de 33 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar con sus tres hijos y su esposo, ella se dedica  a la elaboración de zapatos y a la venta de leche, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Susana quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo una fosa y la pila, pero con lo que gana de sus ventas no le alcanza para poder realizarlo, por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, hierro, y pago de mano de obra y asi poder realizar dicho trabajo para que ella y su familia pueden vivir mas comodos
texts.en:
Susana is 33 years old and lives in the family home with her three children and her husband.

She works at making shoes and selling milk from which she gets income and, with the help of her husband, manages to pay the household expenses.

Susana wants to improve her home by building a septic system, but what she earns in sales is not enough to do it. For that reason, she has applied for a loan for the purchase of cement, sand, rebar and payment of labor and in order to accomplish this work so that she and her family can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to purchase of cement, sand, rebar, and payment of labor.

loans.name: La Alegria Group

texts.es:
El comité La Alegria se formó con la unión de varias vecinas y amigas de la ciudad de Santaní, ellas quieren lograr ayudar a sus familias por medio del esfuerzo en conjunto. Ellas son de una zona bastante alejada del centro, que aún está en crecimiento y que luchan por poder ayudar y crecer, no solo en lo económico, sino también ayudar a su comunidad.
Sulmira, una de las integrantes, se dedica a la cría de animales de corral, y que día a día se está esforzando por salir adelante y dar a su familia todo lo que no pudo tener. Ella comenta que su trabajo es muy sacrificado y que quiere tener el día de mañana una granja donde podrá criar más animales.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar balanceados para sus animales, y así seguir con la cría como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
La Alegría Communal Bank was formed by a group of several neighbors and friends from the city of Santaní.  They want to be able to help their families by working together in a group.  They're from an area that's very far from town and that's still growing.  They strive to be able to help and grow, not only economically but also by helping their community.

Sulmira, one of the members, earns a living raising farmyard animals.  Every day she works hard to get ahead and give her family everything she wasn't able to have.  She said her job is very demanding.  In the future she wants to have a farm so she can raise more animals.

Sulmira's requesting this loan to be able to buy balanced feed so she can keep on raising animals, as she has done in the past.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal feed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy soil amendments, seeds, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruit in bulk from larger plantations to obtain better prices

loans.name: Sara Guadalupe

texts.es: Doña Sara vive en casa propia con su familia, ella  posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, está ubicada en el lugar de su residencia en una localidad muy transitada, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda mas surtida, las personas la prefieren y la mantienen delante de la competencia porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes, como toda buena comerciante  quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, huevos, pan, bebidas, etc. Doña sara  tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sara lives in her own house with her family.  She has a store where she sells basic necessities: beans, milk, eggs, bread, and other things.  She has had her business for many years, which has given her experience in sales and allowed her to earn the best profits.

Sara's store is located in her home in a very busy area.  She has acquired a lot of customers because she has the best-stocked store.  People prefer her and keep her ahead of the competition because she always has what they need: quality products at affordable prices and with incomparable customer service.

Like any good merchant, Sara wants to increase her business and make another investment.  She needs capital, though, so she's asking Integral for a loan to buy basic grains, snacks, eggs, bread, beverages, etc.

Sara has a good payment record and is certain she'll pay back her debt.  She also trusts she'll give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, snacks, eggs, bread, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Ena Guadalupe

texts.es: Ena de 45 años de edad, reside en casa propia con su madre y su hija. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de ricas pupusas. Día a día se levanta muy temprano para ir al mercado y tener frescos y listos los ingredientes que le permiten hacer sus deliciosas pupusas. Tiene mucha clientela ya que cuando de pupusas se trata ella tiene las mejores y con los precios más accesibles. Ha decidido hacer este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio ya que su sueño es verlo crecer de manera que pueda así mejorar su calidad de vida. Piensa invertir en la materia prima necesaria como: maíz, arroz, chicharon, queso, frijoles, tomates, repollo, etc. de esta manera espera lograr su sueño y poder dar a su familia una mejor oportunidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ena, 45, lives in her own house with her mother and her daughter.  She earns a living making and selling delicious pupusas.  Every day she gets up very early to go to the market so she has the fresh ingredients ready to make the pupusas.  She has a lot of customers because she makes the best and most affordable pupusas.

Ena has decided to get a loan from Integral to invest in her business.  Her dream is to see it grow so she can improve her quality of life.  She plans to buy the ingredients she needs: corn, rice, cracklings, cheese, beans, tomatoes, cabbage, etc.

She hopes to achieve her dream and be able to give her family better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy corn, rice, cracklings, cheese, beans, tomatoes, cabbage, etc.

loans.name: Hamila

texts.en:
Hamila is a 33-year-old widow. She has a daughter, Dewi, 11, an elementary school student. Hamila has been running a kiosk business for more than 10 years, located at the traditional market. She operates it daily to provide her customers with basic needs such as soap, detergent, tea, coffee, soft drinks, snack, etc. 

To assist her in running the business, Hamila has hired an assistant. The business starts at 6 am and close at 8 pm. Her income is stable and can cover her family’s needs. At the moment, Hamila wants to purchase some more stocks to replace those that are dwindling. Therefore she is requesting a loan from TLM in the amount of IDR 5,000,000 to be spent on rice, sugar and wheat flour in bulk.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar and wheat flour in bulk

loans.name: Lonie

texts.en:
Lonie is 24 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Lonie is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Lonie has been farming sugarcane for 2 years and also earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Nora Luz

texts.es:
Nora Luz tiene 54 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad de cima cálido, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella brinda servicio de bisutería, también brinda servicio de guardianía de pozos de agua de la municipalidad de su distrito, ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de material para la elaboración de sus productos y de esta manera ofrecerlo a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Nora Luz, 54, lives in Cayalti in the province of Chiclayo which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru.  In this community where the climate is warm, the people work in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock.

Nora makes costume jewelry and also works as a guard at one of the water wells in her town.  She is asking for a loan of 500 nuevos soles to buy material so she can make her products and sell them later to her customers.

loans.use: to buy material to make her products.

loans.name: Lucille

texts.en:
Lucille is 42 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell like soap, chips, eggs, bread, soft drinks, etc.

Lucille has borrowed and repaid 6 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 6 years and also earns an income from food vending and pig fattening.

She aspires to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like soap, chips, eggs, bread, soft drinks, etc

loans.name: Edison

texts.en: Edison is a farmworker. He is married and has one kid. His dream now is to grow even more so he can sell rice in other places as well as the local market. He has asked for a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as manure, sprinklers, pesticides, and fertilizer so he can care for his plants and get a good harvest. This will enable him to generate more money with which to improve his own and his family's standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase manure, sprinklers, pesticides, and fertilizer

loans.name: Sokhorm's Group

texts.en:
Sokhorm, 42, lives with her husband and three children in a village of Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Cambodia. To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice for almost 12 years. The current business earns her about 90,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.

Sokhorm has been with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for nine loan cycles and completely paid back the loans. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, Sokhorm is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her family’s income so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.en: Mercedes is 50 years old, widowed and has four adult-age children. They live in a peaceful village planting and harvesting rice for sale. She also engages in a hog-raising business to have an additional source of income. She would like to strengthen this business in order to earn a higher income. Having inadequate capital, she is requesting for a loan of PHP23,000.00 to buy hog feeds, vitamins, vaccines and additional pigs to raise. Through this financial assistance, she believes that she will be able to make her business profitable.

loans.use: to buy hog feeds, vitamins, vaccines and additional pigs to raise

loans.name: Adriana

texts.en:
An $800.00 loan is offered to Adriana to improve her business. She opened her second hand in 2009. She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store like shirts, long pants and shorts. Adriana is generating a good income from selling.
She has been thinking of running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business. She is living in a town with her family.

loans.use: To buy shirts, long pants and shorts

loans.name: Thim's Group

texts.en:
Thim is 57 years old and married with seven children. Thim lives in a rural area of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province and to make a living, Thim has been farming rice for 17 years. He is able to earn about 30,000KHR per day to meet the family’s need. 
Thim is just with VisionFund for this cycle and now he is leading his group to ask for a loan. As the leader, he is going to use his portion to buy fertilizers for his farmland. He hopes this loan will enable him to earn more income from his current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his farmland

loans.name: Undang

texts.en:
Undang lives west of Bandung, a semi-urban area about three hours from Jakarta.  Undang is married and living with three people in the family home. 

Undang began working with Ruma one month ago because he wanted to increase his income.  He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. As the business continues to run, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Rini

texts.en:
Rini runs a small stall selling snacks and mobile phone airtime credits. She lives west of Bandung, a semi-urban area about three hours from Jakarta.  Rini is married and living with four people in the family home. 

Rini began working with Ruma one month ago because she wanted to increase her income.  She feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. As the business continues to run, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Nurmala

texts.en:
Nurmala runs a small stall selling mobile phone airtime credits. Nurmala lives west of Bandung, a semi-urban area about three hours from Jakarta.  Nurmala is married and living with five people in the family home. 

Nurmala began working with Ruma one month ago because she wanted to increase her income.  She feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. As the business continues to run, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Yert's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area of the Moung Russey district of Battambang Province, Yoert is 41 years old and married with six children, two of whom are in school while another four are too young for school. To make a living, Yert has been working as a rice farmer for 15 years, earning about 40,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.

Yert has been with VisionFund for six cycles and completely paid back the past loans. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her rice paddy.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Karyana

texts.en:
Karyana runs a small stall selling mobile accessories and mobile phone airtime credits. Karyana lives west of Bandung, a semi-urban area about three hours from Jakarta. Karyana is married and living with four people in the family home. 

Karyana began working with Ruma one month ago because he wanted to increase his income.  He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. As the business continues to run, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Anita

texts.en: Anita is a married woman who has six children. Anita buys and sells livestock for a living and she's been in this business for six years. With the income generated from this business, she has successfully repaid her previous loan. Recently, she took a new loan to purchase feed.  In the future, Anita hopes to improve their living conditions further.

loans.use: to purchase feed

location.town: Kahayagan West, Aurora Zamboanga Del Sur

loans.name: Titing

texts.en:
Titing runs a small stall selling snacks and mobile phone airtime credits. Titing lives west of Bandung, a semi-urban area about three hours from Jakarta.  Titing is married and living with five people in the family home. 

Titing began working with Ruma two months ago because she wanted to increase her income.  She feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. As the business continues to run, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Nab's Group

texts.en:
Nab, 38, lives in a rural village in Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Cambodia. She is married and has three children. For the last three years, Nab has been farming rice on three hectares of farmland. The current business earns her about 40,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.  
Nab has been with VisionFund for six loan cycles and she completely paid back the past loans, which have helped her better support her family. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Renato

texts.en: Renato is 47 years old and lives with his wife and children. He is a very hardworking father. He started with rice cultivation on a plot of two hectares. For this, he needs PHP 40,000 to buy fertilizer and pesticides. In the future, Renato wants to expand his areas so that he can make more profits and save for his future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 64 years old and married with nine children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like sugar, shampoo, soap, etc. to sell.

Mary has been in this business for 43 years. In the future she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like sugar, shampoo, soap, etc. to sell

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 46 years old and has two school-aged children. He is a farmer who is raising his family in a rural community.

He wants to improve his hog-raising business and increase his income to meet their daily needs and pay for his children's education. Due to financial hardship, he would like to ask for a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy hog feeds, vitamins and additional pigs to raise. 

He believes that this loan will make it possible for him to improve his business and their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy hog feeds, vitamins and additional pigs to raise

location.town: Brgy. Canabay, Dupax del Sur, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en:
Cresencia is a merchant from Getafe, Bohol. She is 38 years old, married and has five young children. 

Cresencia runs a sari-sari or variety store business, selling different kinds of goods to the people in her neighborhood. She has been in the business for more than 11 years now. This is one source of their income as her husband also works as a fisherman.

Cresencia is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, candies, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries. With more stock in her store, she is hopeful that it can attract more buyers and thus increase her sales and income. 

In the future, Cresencia hopes to improve her livelihood and save money for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, candies, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 74 years old and a widow with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like diapers, sugar, coffee, cream, soft drinks, etc to sell.

Nenita has borrowed and paid back 2 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from food vending and farming sugarcane.

She aspires to saving enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items like diapers, sugar, coffee, cream, soft drinks, etc to sell

loans.name: Naihoern's Group

texts.en:
Naihoern lives in a rural village of the Koh Sotin District of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She is 36 years old and married with two children who are both in school. 

To support her family, she has been farming rice and growing tobacco for eight years. The current business earns her about 50,000 KHR per day, which allows her to make a living and afford to save 30,000 KHR each day after expenses.
 
This is Naihoern’s group loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund and she has been with VisionFund for one cycle. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan, and she wants to use her portion to pay for labor fees. 

She hopes to earn more income from her current business and thus make a better living.

loans.use: to pay for labor fees

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Maricela

texts.es: Maricela de 40 años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol  tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura por lo que se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el rubro, es muy conocido en la zona y ya tiene buena clientela pues obtiene las mejores cosechas, por lo tanto comercia productos de primera calidad y a precios muy accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable, maricela se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad, es una mujer  emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere aumentar la producción, pero necesita de un apoyo de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla,  fertilizante, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorara el terreno donde dese hacer su siembra. Maricela tiene referencias de tener una moral intachable, responsable y de muy buena paga, confía que podrá responder a la deuda y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
40-year old Maricela lives with her husband and children. She grows maize and beans. Because she has been a farmer for many years, she has lots of experience and is well known in the area. She has many good customers because she has high quality produce which she sells for a fair price. 

The service Maricela provides is unequalled, and she is known for her friendliness. She is an enterprising woman with a great desire to get ahead. She wishes to expand production but needs some capital to do so. She has approached INTEGRAL for a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, insecticides etc. so she can improve the land where she wishes to grow her crops. 

Maricela has references that state she is of good character, responsible, and will make her repayments.  She herself trusts that she will be able to pay off her debt and at the same time provide her family with a good life.

loans.use: Buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, insecticides etc. and improve her land

loans.name: Pilar

texts.en:
Pilar works hard to support her family. She is married and has an internet shop business in the Philippines.

She has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional computer unit for her business. She has had this business for 1 year now.

In the future, Pilar would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase an additional computer unit for her business

loans.name: Isau Alexander

texts.es: Isau de 37 años de edad  se dedica al cultivo de maíz adicional a eso también cultiva plátano. De esta forma es como se gana la vida y puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar vive en casa propia con su esposa. La actividad del cultivo la realiza año con año, y es la única forma que conoce de como ganarse la vida. Es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y responsable. Ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución para solicitar un crédito ya que quiere estar preparado con los principales insumos agrícolas como: abonos, venenos para plaga, fertilizantes,  etc.  Espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Isau is 37 years old and grows maize and bananas. This is how he earns his living and puts bread on the table for his family. He lives with his wife in his own house. He grows  maize year after year and it is the only way he knows of earning money. Isau is very hardworking, honest and responsible.

He has decided to approach this institution to ask for a loan to buy the main agricultural inputs such as manure, insecticides, fertilizer etc. He hopes to have good results as he has no other source of income. Isau trusts in God that he will have a plentiful harvest which will allow him to provide for his family.

loans.use: Buy manure, insecticides, fertilizer etc.

loans.name: Rhoda

texts.en:
Rhoda is 56 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. Rhoda is borrowing PHP 29500 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Rhoda has been pig fattening for 13 years and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to buy more farmland.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Sonia Devi

texts.en:
Hardworking and determined, Sonia loves to meet and interact with people of different backgrounds and cultures. She is pictured with her mother. 

She lives in Khonghampat, which is 14 kms away from the heart of Imphal city, Manipur, in northeastern India. Sonia is the second child of her parents. She has one elder brother who is a cultivator by profession. Her younger brother is still studying in pre-secondary school. Sonia was raised in an inter-marriage family. Her father belongs to the Meitei community, which is considered in Manipur as the privileged group. Her mother is from the minor tribes of Manipur. Being raised in a cross-cultural family, Sonia could incorporate different aspects of culture, tradition, religion into her daily life. 

Meeting new people and being exposed to new ways of thinking isn't a challenge for this confident young woman. Her father is a primary teacher and her mother, a homemaker. With only the income of her father they manage all the household expenses. 

Since her parents could no longer support her studies, she went to the capital state and looked for a job in the hospitality industry to self-support for education. Sonia says she worked very hard to pursue her education and career at the same time. 

Air hostess has always been a dream career for her. Luckily, when the interview was conducted in Imphal, she was selected as one of the successful candidates. It was a perk for her as she had experience in the hospitality industry to get the cabin crew job easily, says Sonia. However, just clearing the interview wasn't the complete process. She was worried about the big amount of money to be paid to the airlines for the security deposit to enroll her for the training. All the challenges did not deter her from achieving her goals. As she sought help from her family and friends, fortunately one of her uncles suggested that WSDS gives education loans to those who need financial assistance. 

With the loan, she will pay for her refundable deposit, invest in helping others who need financial assistance like her and support her parents. She is so grateful to WSDS for helping her to fly high and fulfill her aspirations. She says confidently that her parents would be so proud of her and she hopes to do much better in the future.

loans.use: To pay the security deposit for cabin crew training.

loans.name: Lhingjoycy

texts.en:
A lot of people tend to take military service in India for granted but she respects her father for his loyalty to the country and for taking care of the family, shares Lhingjoycy. She is the eldest daughter with three other siblings and her father is a retired army man. Her mother is a homemaker and is engaged in taking care of the family.  Lhingjoycy is pictured with her mother and excited to share her experiences while pursuing her career.

Lhingjoycy started working at an early age as a saleslady in a departmental shop in the capital of the country. It takes three days and two nights to travel by train to reach the capital. She completed her pre-secondary and did not continue her degree, but instead began earning and sharing her father's financial burden. Managing the family's financial affairs with the meagre monthly pension of her father usually leaves her parents in despair as her father is the sole bread winner and her other siblings are still in school.

Lhingjoycy spent two years in sales and but could hardly manage for herself with high rent and other expenses in the capital town of New Delhi. Left with very few options for jobs, as a good-salaried job requires a higher degree and job experience, she continued her retailing job and took care of herself and was still hunting for a better opportunity. 

Recently after a job trial at various openings, Lhingjoycy got selected for cabin crew for a domestic airline in India. She is overwhelmed for the job and insecure because one pays the refundable training fees. Tension was high with nowhere to access a loan or ask from relatives and the payment date was approaching. If one fails to pay on the stipulated date, then there is no mercy. Her neighbouring friend who is a cabin crew recruit for another airline and also accessed a loan from WSDS had a suggestion, after Lhingjoycy shared her financial insecurity about the refundable deposit. She consulted her parents and her mother insisted for the loan so that she can support the family while she earns as a flight attendant.

With the Kiva loan, she will pay for the training fees and will join the aviation industry, make a salary and support her siblings in their studies and also take care of her parents.

Lhingjoycy's gratitude is immense and she will always remain obliged for the wonderful generosity accorded her in shaping her career. The pathway that Kiva and WSDS creates for her is unconditional and sincere. She says, “thank you so much, Kiva.”

loans.use: To pay for her training course fee as a cabin crew/flight attendant

loans.name: Vicky

texts.fr:
Agée de 32 ans, Vicky vit dans une famille polygame avec ses 03 enfants dans le quartier CASSABLANCA. Elle vend des oranges à la criée dans les quartiers environnants et tous les soirs. 
Vicky s’approvisionne 04 fois par mois au marché "Abattoir". 
Elle consacre à son activité près de 8heures par jour.
Par ce prêt, elle souhaite augmenter son stock de marchandise par 01 sac d’orange.
texts.en: Vicky is 32 years old and lives in a polygamous family with her three children in the Cassablanca district. She sells oranges at auction every evening in the surrounding districts. She gets her supplies four times a month at the "Abattoir" market. She devotes nearly eight hours a day to her business. With this loan she wants to increase her stock with one sack of oranges.

loans.use: to buy one sack of oranges.

loans.name: Blanca Amelia

texts.es: Blanca de 55 años de edad  vive junto a su hijo y su nuera en casa propia; Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, tiene 20 años con este trabajo y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener los mejores resultados, su negocio esta ubicado en una zona muy estratégica y frecuentada por las personas de la comunidad, es muy conocida pues sus tortillas son las mas ricas y siempre están calientitas, tiene mucha clientela y la buscan por su excelente calidad, buenos precios y sobre todo el servicio mas rápido; Blanca es una mujer luchadora, entregada a su labor, su mas grande meta es alcanzar el triunfo y se esfuerza día con día para ganarse ese futuro mas próspero; en estos últimos meses ha aumentado la demanda y quiere aprovechar para aumentar su inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, cal, etc. para poder seguir con su trabajo y tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en:
Blanca, 55, lives with her son and daughter-in-law in her own house.  She has been selling tortillas for 20 years and has gained much experience which has allowed her to improve her profits.  Her business is located in a very strategic area which is visited frequently by people in the community.  She is well known because her tortillas are the best and always hot.  She has many customers who seek her out because of her excellent product, low prices and fast service.

Blanca is a determined woman who is dedicated to her work.  Her greatest goal is to be successful; so she works hard every day to make her future more prosperous.  In the last few months, demand has increased and she wants to take advantage of the situation to increase her investment.  Since she does not have enough capital she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy wholesale corn, lime, etc. so she can continue working and giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy wholesale corn, lime, etc.

loans.name: Djekafo Group

texts.fr:
Les quatre  femmes du groupe Djekafo sont mariées majoritairement dans des ménages polygamiques. Elles ont en moyenne 46 ans et 5 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans le quartier de Sabalibougou dans le district de Bamako; Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu au marché de Sabalibougou. Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce de, condiments (oignons, tomates et aubergines), produits cosmétiques, habits et colliers. Dans le but de se ravitailler au comptant, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 3ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Kadia (2 eme de la gauche vers la droite) a une grande réputation dans la vente de condiments (oignons, tomates et aubergines); Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 5 sacs d’oignons, 4 corbeilles de tomates et 4 sacs d’aubergine  à Bamako en gros. La revente se fait à Sabalibougou à une clientèle composée majoritairement de femmes. Madame Kadia espère réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 90 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge les soins de santé des enfants.
texts.en:
The four women in the Djekafo group are married and the majority of them live in polygamous households. They average 46 years old with five children each and they all live in the Sabalibougou neighborhood of the Bamako district. They got to know each other as neighbors and through their income-generating activities at the Sabalibougou market. The group members have small businesses selling condiments (onions, tomatoes and egg plants), cosmetics, clothes and necklaces. In order to be able to get fresh supplies for cash, they decided to collaborate with Soro Yiriwaso and are on their third group loan.

Kadia, who is the second from the left in the photo, has a good reputation for selling condiments (onions, tomatoes and egg plants). She is planning to use her loan to buy five sacks of onions, four baskets of tomatoes and four sacks of egg plants, wholesale in Bamako. She resells her products in Sabaligbougou to a customer base made up primarily of women. With the help of this loan, Kadia hopes to make an average monthly profit of 90,000FCFA, which will be used partly to reinvest in her business and partly to pay for her children's healthcare.

loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Lolo Group

texts.fr:
Les sept femmes du groupe Lolo sont mariées majoritairement dans des ménages polygamiques. Elles ont en moyenne 44 ans et 5 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans le quartier de Sabalibougou dans le district de Bamako; Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu au marché de Sabalibougou. Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce de, fruits et légumes (mangues et papayes), condiments, sacs, habits et boissons. Dans le but de se ravitailler au comptant, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 3ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Djénèba (femme  debout en 2ème position de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo) a une grande réputation dans la vente de fruits et légumes (mangues et papayes).  Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 20 cartons de mangues et 15 corbeilles de papayes  à Bamako en gros. La revente se fait  à Sabalibougou à une clientèle mixte. Madame Djénèba espère réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 80 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge les soins de santé des enfants.
texts.en:
The seven women in the Lolo group are married and the majority of them live in polygamous households. They average 44 years old with five children each and they all live in the Sabalibougou neighborhood of the Bamako district. They got to know each other as neighbors and through their income-generating activities at the Sabalibougou market. The group members have small businesses selling fruit and vegetables (mangos and papaya), condiments, bags, clothes and drinks. In order to be able to get fresh supplies for cash, they decided to collaborate with Soro Yiriwaso and are on their third group loan.

Djénèba, who is standing second from the left in the photo, has a good reputation for selling fruit and vegetables (mangos and papaya). She is planning to use her loan to buy 20 cartons of mangos and 15 baskets of papaya, wholesale in Bamako. She resells her products in Sabaligbougou to a mixed customer base. With the help of this loan, Kadia hopes to make an average monthly profit of 80,000FCFA, which will be used partly to reinvest in her business and partly to pay for her children's healthcare.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Perez

texts.es: Israel de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de papayas y hortalizas desde hace varios años y eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para asistir sus cultivos, sus cosechas las comercializa en los mercados y compras de hortalizas con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar. Israel solicita un credito para poder  comprar los insumos necesarios como fertilizantes, herbicidas, abonos, entre otras cosas para tener buenas cosechas y asi el pueda obtener  mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Israel, 41, lives in his own home with his wife and two children. He has been cultivating papaya and vegetables for many years which has given him ample experience in attending to his crops.  He sells his produce at the markets and uses the profit to cover household expenses.

Israel is in need of a loan to buy the supplies he needs, such as fertilizers, herbicides, compost and other items for a good harvest.  This will increase his earnings so he can give his family greater economic stability.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers, herbicides, compost and other items.

loans.name: Kanouya Group

texts.fr:
Les  femmes du groupeKANOUYAont en moyenne  43ans, 6enfants et vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles élargies à TOMINIAN/SEGOU (laquatrième région  administrative de la république du Mali).
Ces femmes se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et font  les activités d’achat et de vente des condiments ? des céréales et de la restauration.  Après avoir remboursés correctement leurs prêts précédents, les femmes du groupe KANOUYA sont à leur 10ème  prêt solidaire. BERNADETTE 2ème femme de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo,  compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 3 paniers de tomate, 6Kg d’oignon, 5Kg de sel, 25Kg de riz, 2 cartons de spaghetti, 10Kg de haricot, 3 paquets de Cube Maggi, 10Kg de mil, 10Kg de patate douce, et 10Litres d’huile pour des fins de restauration. Elle s’approvisionne à San et  effectue ses ventes, à une clientèle composée de femmes et d’hommes en espèce et souvent à crédit.
Elle envisage réaliser  un bénéfice moyen mensuel de 50 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé  dans les dépenses relatives à la santé,  à la nourriture,  l’habillement, aux frais scolaires et le reste sera  réinvesti dans les activités.
texts.en:
The women of the Kanouya group average 43 years of age with six children each, and they all live in extended traditional families in Tominian/Ségou (the Republic of Mali's fourth administrative region). These women got to know each other through family and have small businesses buying and selling condiments and cereals, and running restauration activities. Having repaid in full their previous loans, the women of the Kanouya group are on their tenth group loan. 

Bernadette, who is second from the right in the photo, is planning to use her loan to buy three baskets of tomatoes, six kilos of onions, five kilos of salt, 25 kilos of rice, two cartons of spaghetti, ten kilos of beans, three packets of Maggi stock cubes, ten kilos of millet, ten kilos of sweet potatoes and ten liters of oil for her restauration business. She gets her supplies from San and sells her products to a customer base made up of men and women, for cash and often on credit. She is expecting to make an average monthly profit of 50,000FCFA, which will be used for health-related expenses, food, clothing and school fees, with the rest to be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for restauration activity.

loans.name: Sabaly Group

texts.fr:
Les  femmes du groupe SABALY ont en moyenne  44 ans, 4 enfants et vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles élargies à BIENSO/SEGOU (la quatrième région  administrative de la république du Mali).
Ces femmes se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et font  les activités d’achat et de vente des condiments et des céréales.  Après avoir remboursés correctement leurs prêts précédents, les femmes du groupe SABALY sont à leur  5ème  prêt solidaire. KOTIMI ISSA 1ère femme debout de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo   compte utiliser son prêt pour  acheter 2 paniers de tomate, 10Kg d’oignon, 25Kg de Sel et 10Kg de piment. Elle s’approvisionne sur place et dans les villages environnants. Elle effectue ses ventes, à une clientèle composée de femmes et d’hommes en espèce et souvent à crédit.
Elle envisage réaliser  un bénéfice moyen mensuel de 28 000FCFA qui sera utilisé  dans les dépenses relatives à la santé,  à la nourriture,  l’habillement, aux frais scolaires et le reste sera  réinvesti dans les activités.
texts.en:
The women in the Sabaly group average 44 years of age with four children each and all live in extended traditional families in Bienso/Segou (the Republic of Mali's fourth administrative region). They got to know each other as relatives and neighbors and all have small businesses buying and selling condiments and cereals. Having repaid in full their previous loans, the women in the Sabaly group are on their fifth group loan. 

Kotimi Issa, who is standing on the far left of the photo, is planning to use her loan to buy two baskets of tomatoes, 10kg of onions, 25kg of salt and 10kg of chilis. She gets her supplies locally and in the surrounding villages. She sells her products to a customer base made up of men and women, for cash and often on credit. She expects to make an average monthly profit of 28,000FCFA, which will be used for health-related costs, food, clothing and school fees, with the remainder to be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Mario Javier

texts.es: Mario de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, el posee un negocio de enderezado y pintura ubicado en su lugar de residencia adicional a eso también se dedica a la agricultura siembra maíz, con lo que obtiene de sus trabajos logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Mario esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de pintura, barniz, aceites, y demás herramientas para seguir con su trabajo y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Mario, 47, lives in his own home with his family.  He has an auto body and paint shop set up at home and also grows corn.  With his two incomes he is able to cover household expenses.

Mario is requesting a loan to buy paint, varnish, oils and other tools to continue his work and improve his earnings so he can give his family a quality lifestyle without limitations.

loans.use: To buy paint, varnish, oils and other tools.

loans.name: Juan Miguel

texts.es: Don Juan de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica desde hace varios años a la crianza de pollos, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Don Juan esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de vitaminas y concentrado para poder seguir con la crianza de pollos y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan, 62, lives in his own home with his family and has been raising chickens for several years.  He sells them at different markets near his community and is able to earn enough income to cover household expenses.

Juan is requesting a loan to buy animal feed and vitamins to continue raising chickens and giving his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy animal feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Sarith's Group

texts.en:
A villager from a rural area located in the Tbaung Khmum district of Kampong Cham province, Sarith is 34 years old and married. She has three children. One of her children is too young for school and the other two are in school. Having been in this business for 16 years, she can earn about 33,000 KHR per day and manages to save about 12,000 KHR each day after expenses.

Sarith is just with VisionFund for this cycle. She is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes to grow healthier rice and cassava to increase her family’s income and improve her living condition.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Jose Alizandro

texts.es: Jose de 42 años de edad desde vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, hace 15 años que se dedica a la agricultura la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos, siembra maiz y frijol con lo que gana de sus cosechas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar. El quiere comprar los insumos necesarios para sus cosechas como abonos, fertilizantes, semillas y mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografia pero dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para dicha inversión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito ya que solo de esta forma puede continuar su proceso de cultivo. Al igual que todo campesino, deposita su confianza en la agricultura ya que no poseen otra fuente de ingresos y desea superarse haciendo lo mejor que puede en sus cultivos. Espera obtener una cosecha abundante que le permita seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar y cancelar dicho crédito.
texts.en:
Jose, 42, lives in his own house with his wife and son.  He has been working in agriculture for 15 years, so it is his main source of income.  He grows corn and beans and is able to cover the household expenses with the profit he makes from crop sales.  He wants to buy the supplies he needs, such as compost, fertilizers and seeds, and to improve the cropland shown in the photograph.  But he realizes he does not have the economic resources necessary for the investment so has decided to request a loan.  That is the only way he can continue his business.

Like all farmers, he places all his trust in agriculture since he has no other source of income.  He wants to do the best he can through his crop activity.  He hopes to achieve an abundant harvest so he can continue putting food on the table every day and pay back the loan.

loans.use: To buy compost, fertilizers and seeds, and to improve his land.

loans.name: Naisean's Group

texts.en:
Naisean is thirty-six. She lives with her husband and two children in a rural village within the Tbaung Khmum district of Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. She has struggled to feed and care for her children using the income she receives from farming rice and selling grocery items. She is able to earn about 40,000 KHR per day to feed the family. 

Naisean joined VisionFund this loan cycle. She is leading her group to ask for a loan to buy more grocery items to resell. She hopes to grow her rice healthily and harvest more crops to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items to resell

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Susima

texts.en:
Susima is sixty-one years old, married and has seven children. 

She is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Susima requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Susima has been fattening pigs for three years now. She has borrowed eleven times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Susima would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Ratana's Group

texts.en:
Ratana is thirty-one, married and living with her child in a rural village of the Dambae district of Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. She earns a living by farming rice. She has been in this business for thirteen years and earns about KHR 40,000 per day. After expenses, she is able to save about half of this for future needs.

Ratana has been with VisionFund for three cycles. She completely paid back her previous loans. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. She wants to use her portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her business and earn a larger income to make her life better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is a thirty-one-year-old married woman living with her spouse and two children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.

Her husband owns a shop selling chicken. His daily practice is to buy broilers (chickens specifically bred and raised for meat production) from the market and sell the meat from his shop. Recently he spent a huge part of his income to pay utility bills which depleted his ability to add new inventory to his business. Therefore, Shazia has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so her husband can buy broilers. She dreams of providing her children with everything they need in life.

loans.use: to buy broilers for producing chicken meat to sell.

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en:
Tessie is thirty-two years old and married with children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Tessie has a business buying and selling peanuts in the Philippines. She requested a loan of PHP 30,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of peanuts to sell.

Tessie has been in this business for nine years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of peanuts to sell

loans.name: Jahiran

texts.en:
The self-help group movement in Sankarpur has changed many lives and the process continues to transform more every day. The village of Sankarpur is on the borders of the eastern state of Jharkhand and is home to many farmers. Sankarpur is a station between Howrah- Patna railway lines. Therefore, accessibility is good, carrying agricultural produce is convenient. People will supply the vegetables to Deoghar or Madhupur market. The women in this village previously were only housewives, but after joining self-help groups, they came forward and are working in different fields. 

Jahiran is 32 years old and lives with her husband and three children (two sons and a daughter). She is very friendly and hardworking women. She works hard in her own cultivable land where she grows vegetables of good quality. She sells the vegetables in the different markets in Deoghar and earns annually INR 20,000. Jahiran is requesting a loan to buy agricultural inputs such as pest controls, fertilizers, and seeds, and materials she needs for planting. She is eager to increase her sales and be able to earn better profits and give her family better economic stability.

Jahiran’s husband is working in the brick manufacturing field and earns INR 5,000 per month. The couple is working very hard to run the family. Her husband’s dream is to leave his job and start his own stationery shop in his locality.

loans.use: to buy pest controls, fertilizers, and seeds

loans.name: Sulekha

texts.en:
Sulekha is an enterprising woman. She is 30 years and lives in Sankarpur village, Deoghar, Jharkhand. She is married and has three daughters; all of them go to school. 

Since 2008 her husband has been running a small tailoring business in Bhojpur. His income is around INR 7,000 per month which is hardly enough to cover their basic needs. Since Sulekha knew tailoring, she started helping her husband. The couple has earned the goodwill of their customers in the neighbourhood. 

Sulekha is requesting a loan of INR 10,000 to purchase a sewing machine and cloth materials to sell ready-made garments.  She hopes she will earn additional income from this.

In the future, she wants to have a boutique with stitching facilities. She also wants to give better education to her daughters and see them become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine and cloth materials

loans.name: Narema

texts.en:
Narema (49) is married and mother of five children. She is living in Bhojpur, a small village in the borders of eastern state of Jharkhand.  

Narema’s husband has a tailoring shop. She was just a housewife taking care of her family, but after joining a Self Help Group (SHG) supported by the local NGO “MESP” she was inspired to help her husband in his business. 

Their start-up is doing well. Narema is a hard-working woman with vision for business and concern for clients and delivering on time. The couple earns around INR 6,000 per month. 

Narema is requesting a loan of INR 10,000 with which she wants to buy a sewing machine and expand her tailoring business. She hopes to save enough for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Noorjahan

texts.en:
Noorjahan is 24 years old and lives in Sankarpur village, Deoghar, Jharkhand. She never went to school as her parents could not afford her school fees but she has learnt how to sign her name. She lives with her husband and a son. Noorjahan takes care of the family and is dependent on her husband’s income. 

For years her husband was working in industrial factories as a labourer in the state of Gujarat which was hampering their family life. So now they are planning to stay together while her husband starts working as a blacksmith. Bhojpur, the place they are residing, is a small village with no more than 3,000 population and it is famous for blacksmiths. Many of them even work as vendors of the iron utensils. The utensils have good demand in West Bengal, Bihar, and Jharkhand. So both Noorjahan and her husband are hopeful if they start this business they can make good profit.

Noorjahan is requesting a loan of INR 10,000 to buy the tools required to make iron utensils.  This young entrepreneur dreams of having their own shop. She wants to improve her economy in order to support her family on a daily basis and to make sure her baby boy has everything he needs and save enough for his bright future.

loans.use: to buy the tools required to make iron utensils

loans.name: Shaina

texts.en:
Shaina is 27 years old and comes from a small village, Sankarpur, in the district of Deoghar, Jharkhand. She is a very energetic and optimistic woman who does not want to give up. She lives with her husband and two children who go to school. Both husband and wife are illiterate because their families could not afford school fees. 

Shaina’s husband has been engaged in a tailoring business for some time now in his neighbourhood.  He stitches various sorts of clothes like shirts, pants etc. Even after all the hard work he is not able to manage the household expenses as the prices are going up day by day. So Shaina started helping him; she stitches different types of garments, especially for ladies as there is a high demand for their clothes in her neighbourhood.

She is requesting a loan of INR 10,000, to purchase materials, such as cloth, thread, needles, etc., that are needed for her business. Shaina wishes that their business would keep growing so that she can help her husband and overcome the financial hurdles that they are now facing.

loans.use: to purchase cloth, thread and needles for her tailoring business

loans.name: Nelson Eliseo

texts.es: Nelson de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia  junto con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, Él se dedica al cultivo de maiz y frijol desde hace varios años. De esta forma es como se gana la vida y puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. La actividad del cultivo la realiza año con año, y es la única forma que conoce de como ganarse la vida. Es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y responsable. A pesar de las condiciones en las que vive, las cuales son muy humildes no se cansa de trabajar y de dar lo mejor a su familia. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito para comprar los principales insumos agrícolas: abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, etc. Espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Nelson is 35 years old. He lives in his own home with his life's companion and their two children. He has worked growing corn and beans for several years. This is how he earns a living and brings home the daily bread. He does his crop activity year to year and it is the only way that he knows how to earn a living. He is a very hardworking, honest and responsible man. Despite the conditions in which he lives, which are very humble, he does not get tired of working and giving his family his best.
